Text: Looks like that email was removed.  Try roger_gerard AT rocketmail.com
Any way we could get a list of what RPGs are in these?

Jerith667, this is just a tiny database file with more torrents in it. They are sorted alphabetically, so if you double click a torrent file, it will open and allow you to see the contents and select from it.
Sorry, I hadn't noticed there was no "G."  You are probably looking for Gamma World or Ghostbusters?  I'll search what I have.
GURPs actually, but Classic GW or GB are good too.
